channel.title: Digital Nomad on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Nomad on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: Time to start the next adventure
item.description: Exciting! Finally I am ready to take the next step. I’ve sorted out the things I needed and started a business that allows me to begin my freelance work. The time has come to find my first assignment and with that, start my first adventure as digital nomad.

item.title: An unexpected turn of events
item.description: Today I am almost 4,5 months into my journey and already flying back to the Netherlands. A lot has happened and I have made a couple of realizations that have made me (temporarily) come back sooner than planned.
